transcript.text: hi there welcome to my youtube channel

he wants us to come to him and ask him

only way we can do that is to enter into

the interpretation of dreams comes from

a lot of people don't have dreams very
regularly
and what I would recommend to them is if

if you keep asking for revelation from

remember in the parable of the talents

talents made two more
they were good stewards they invested
and they multiplied what the Lord had
given them the servant who had one

that means that if we are faithful if we
steward if we take what the Lord has

do your best to engage God and engage
